scripts.ptau:phase2: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 build/pot16_0001.ptau build/pot16_final.ptau
scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/zkCoupon.r1cs build/pot16_final.ptau build/zkCoupon_0000.zkey
scripts.vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/zkCoupon_final.zkey public/verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/zkCoupon_final.zkey build/witness.wtns public/proof.json public/publicSignals.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify public/verification_key.json public/publicSignals.json public/proof.json
scripts.sol: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/zkCoupon_final.zkey contracts/Verifier.sol
scripts.plonk:setup: snarkjs plonk setup build/zkCoupon.r1cs build/pot16_final.ptau build/zkCoupon_plonk.zkey
scripts.plonk:vkey: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/zkCoupon_plonk.zkey public/verification_key.json
scripts.plonk:prove: snarkjs plonk prove build/zkCoupon_plonk.zkey build/witness.wtns public/proof.json public/publicSignals.json
scripts.plonk:verify: snarkjs plonk verify public/verification_key.json public/publicSignals.json public/proof.json
scripts.plonk:sol: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier build/zkCoupon_plonk.zkey contracts/PlonkVerifier.sol
